snippet: The sommelier ought to be seen as a positive force, an interpreter and guide who can shepherd a meal along a rewarding and enlightening path.
abstract: Eric Asimov The Pour column contends sommelier is the one person who stands between patrons and humiliation when choosing wine for dinner; says they should be seen as positive force, interpreter and guide who can shepherd meal along rewarding and enlightening path.
lead_paragraph: The sommelier ought to be seen as a positive force, an interpreter and guide who can shepherd a meal along a rewarding and enlightening path.

headline.print_headline: The Wine List Comes With a Friend, Not a Foe
headline.seo: One Person Stands Between You and a Fine Wine — The Sommelier
headline.main: Your New Best Friend: The Sommelier
